channel.title: HugeSpaceship :: HugeSpaceship Docs
channel.description: This is the documentation site for all of the HugeSpaceship projects. PatchworkA plugin to fix some of LittleBigPlanet's security vulnerabilities BoosterBooster is a user friendly patching tool for the LittleBigPlanet games HugeSpaceshipHugeSpaceship is a high performance scalable LittleBigPlanet custom server LBPSearchLBPSearch is a tool to search the LittleBigPlanet archive

item.title: Patchwork
item.description: A plugin to fix some of LittleBigPlanet's security vulnerabilities

item.title: Booster
item.description: Booster is a user friendly patching tool for the LittleBigPlanet games

item.title: HugeSpaceship
item.description: HugeSpaceship is a high performance scalable LittleBigPlanet custom server

item.title: LBPSearch
item.description: LBPSearch is a tool to search the LittleBigPlanet archive
